name: whipped-dream
effect: Traded on a Swirlix: Holder evolves into Slurpuff.
short_effect: Traded on a Swirlix: Holder evolves into Slurpuff.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy,
puffy, whipped and whirled cream.
It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
